snippet.title: Amiga Longplay  Blood Money
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played By: Lemm

First, there was Menace! Now, Psygnosis presents ... a DMA designed game ... Blooood Moneyyyy

I mixed the ingame music after recording in the movie to get both "sound FX and ingame music". Because, his feature isn't possible to choose in the options menu. 
I hope you like it... Letz get greedy :-) -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
